config.wind_prob_tooltip: Probability for wind during a day [Default: 0.5]
config.wind_bushes_tooltip: Whether bushes are affected by wind or not [Default: On]
config.wind_crops_tooltip: Whether crops are affected by wind or not [Default: On]
config.wind_grass_tooltip: Whether grass is affected by wind or not [Default: On]
config.wind_trees_tooltip: Whether trees (regular or fruit) are affected by wind or not [Default: On]
